original_text: But after they had brought it around, the hand of the Lord was against the city, causing a very great panic, and he afflicted the men of the city, both young and old, so that tumors broke out on them.
korean_text: 그것을 옮겨 간 후에 여호와의 손이 심히 큰 환난을 그 성읍에 더하사 성읍 사람들의 작은 자와 큰 자를 다 쳐서 독한 종기가 나게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: But after they had brought it around,
the hand of the Lord was against the city,
and he afflicted the men of the city,
so that tumors broke out on them.
